title: String Reveals guy to post a new video soon. Thoughts?
selftext:
Sasta Dhanush had tweeted few days back:

[https://twitter.com/StringReveals/status/1685909238063992832?s=20](https://twitter.com/StringReveals/status/1685909238063992832?s=20)

But, no video has come up yet. Could it be the case that the recent incidents of train shooting and Nuh violence misaligned with his agenda or are they simply going to continue blaming external forces? Thoughts?
comments:
Lots of lies, propaganda, some tall claims without any proof.. mention of Soros a few Times..blame minorities
 That's all ..
